text: Children of the Mind (1996) is the fourth, and currently the last, book of Orson Scott Card's popular Ender's Game series, a series of science fiction novels that focus on the character Ender Wiggin. Although Card has written some additional novels that take place with in the Ender Saga, they take place in the middle of the storyline and therefore are not sequals to Children of The Mind. ==Other websites== * About the book Children of the Mind from Card's website Category:1996 books Category:Ender's Game (novel series)
title: Children of the Mind
